{{{
@Join
class GroupAndUser {
    Group group;
    GroupUser groupUser;
    User user;
}

@Table
class Group {
    @Column(primaryKey=true)
    Long groupKey;
}

@Table
class GroupUser {
    @Column(references="Group.groupKey")
    Long groupKey;
    @Column(references="User.userKey")
    Long userKey;
}

@Table
class User {
    @Column(primaryKey=true)
    Long userKey;
}

SELECT A.group_key group_groupKey, B.role_type groupUser_roleType, C.user_key user_userKey
FROM NC_GROUP A inner join NC_GROUP_USER B ON A.group_key = B.group_key inner JOIN NC_USER C ON B.user_key = C.user_key
